"Cinder" is a science fiction film that tells the story of a young woman named Cinder who grows up an orphan and must learn to survive alone in a dark post-modern underworld of deceit greed, yet still somehow finds love. After she runs away, her modern  "prince" has to think outside of the box to find her.
"Cinder" features a talented cast including: Cate Blanchett as Cinderella, Hayley Atwood as Rapunzel, Liliomina Teixeira as Aurora, Sarah Gadoune as Jasmine, Dwayne Johnson as Baloo, and Sam Worthington as Lord Frollo.
Overall, "Cinder" is an exciting and well-made science fiction film that tells the story of a young woman named Cinder who grows up an orphan and must learn to survive alone in a dark post-modern underworld of deceit greed, yet still somehow finds love.

"The Underneath" is a 2019 Filipino drama film directed by Arjan Reza and produced by Magsaysay Pictures. The film stars Adam Trese, Paul Dooley, Peter Gallagher, Richard Linklater, Joe Don Baker, Shelley Duvall.
The plot of "The Underneath" follows two newly married couple find themselves trapped in a network of underground caves. With her husband injured, the new bride is forced to find her way back to the surface in order to save his life. In the process, they discover a terrifying truth about the  "underneath", they are not alone. Something evil is hunting them.
Overall, "The Underneath" seems like an intriguing and thought-provoking film that explores themes such as love, loss, betrayal, and redemption.
